Data Fields
device_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Device Configuration

A device driver (can either be an MCU peripheral or external IC) More...

#include <device_config.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_t:

Detailed Description

This data structure contains the driver name, function pointers, port number, and type.

Data Fields

char name [NAME_MAX]
 The name of the device.
 
u8 uid
 The user ID of the device.
 
u8 gid
 The group ID of the device.
 
u16 mode
 The file access values.
 
device_driver_t driver
 The driver functions.
 
device_cfg_t cfg
 The configuration for the device.
